title: Medical Simulation-Based Role-Play Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Conducting team role-playing in a simulation environment using digital devices, maximizing learning effectiveness through real-world medical scenario simulations.

learning_goals: Learners can apply effective clinical communication skills through interaction with patient roles in simulation environments
Learners can systematically document clinical content using simulation recording systems with over 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze problems identified in medical simulations and propose improvement strategies through PBL team projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
